sentences.en: I have a case that troubles me exceedingly.
sentences.cn: 我有一件非常棘手的案子。

sentences.en: It was one of the qualities in her which pleased him exceedingly.
sentences.cn: 这正是她的美德之一,他对此十分欣赏.

sentences.en: It's exceedingly unusual to find such treasure in the genetic attic.
sentences.cn: 能找到遗传家谱这种珍宝,简直是太不寻常了.

sentences.en: Not being a mother, I found the chit-chat exceedingly dull.
sentences.cn: 我没当母亲，所以觉得那样的闲谈无聊透顶。

sentences.en: Physical perfection in a human being is exceedingly rare.
sentences.cn: 体貌完美的人极为罕见。

sentences.en: She came in and sat down at her place , feeling exceedingly wretched.
sentences.cn: 她进来后,坐在自己的位子上,很伤心.

sentences.en: She was exceedingly wrathful and struck at Hurstwood, who dodged.
sentences.cn: 她愤怒至极,对着赫斯渥就是一棍子, 赫斯渥躲开了.

sentences.en: Thank you. You’ve been exceedingly kind.
That elderly gentleman was exceedingly on jump, as nervous as a man well could be.
sentences.cn: 那位老绅士坐立不安，紧张得不得了。

sentences.en: That elderly gentleman was exceedingly on the jump , as nervous as a man well could be.
sentences.cn: 那位老绅士坐立不安, 紧张得不得了.

sentences.en: The child has skipped to the third grade as he did exceedingly well in his studies.
sentences.cn: 这孩子因成绩优异而越级升入三年级.

sentences.en: The scenery in Switzerland is exceedingly attractive to the tourists from the whole world.
sentences.cn: 瑞士的风景对来自全世界的游客都很有吸引力.

sentences.en: This was an exceedingly difficult decision to take.
